overview:
Thomas J. Hayes is President & CEO of GrowthWorks Atlantic Ltd. Tom brings managerial and senior executive experience in the private, public, and volunteer sectors to GrowthWorks. As CEO of Atlantic Fish Specialties Ltd., he led the company through a major restructuring and turnaround resulting in the company being recognized as one of the top small business in Canada, winning the prestigious Canada Award of Business Excellence.

Tom has also served as Chief of Staff for the Office of the Premier in Nova Scotia and has been awarded an Atlantic Canada Entrepreneur of the Year Award. He has thirty years of business and management experience and is a past Chair of the Atlantic Provinces Economic Council (APEC).
